website_summaries.verdict: A reliable table with a lower shelf.
pros: This simple table is easy to assemble and is sturdy despite its lightness
The wood finish is convincing, making this a great cheaper option
cons: The wood and metal both scratch easily

customer_reviews.title: Great "stand" for my critter cage!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table because it was cheap and because I needed a stand for my critter cage. This one was just the correct dimensions, it has a shelf and it appeared in the ad that casters would be able to be added. The package arrived in great condition, easy flat box and everything was intact. It went together super easy and was level and sturdy...enough. Its certainly not the best looking for a living room but it would do fo someone who is looking for a low cost alternative to milk crates and a piece of plywood for a top :) This ended up being a great choice for my needs and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: elobrien75

customer_reviews.title: Broke After Four Months of Use
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Classic in Brown on April 1st. Initially the table was fine, but by early August, the table had become so structurally unstable that we had to throw it out. The weak points of this table are the corner soldering in the metal frame. It's poorly soldered and will break with enough use. In four months of moderate use two corners spontaneously decided to break off! Definitely not worth our $50 when cheaper coffee tables have lasted much longer without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for I suppose.
customer_reviews.text: The construction of this is not what I wanted. It is a piece of particle board sitting in a metal frame. The result is an artificial looking surface with a table that has a raised metal edge around it. The top easily comes out of the frame if you push on it from underneath. I would have 100x preferred a table with a flat, solid top. I bought their TV stand, which is exactly the same construction. I think it is fine setup for putting a TV on and forgetting about, but for a piece of furniture as central to a room as a coffee table is, the cheap construction takes away from its usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: BBbeans

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to put together, and nice looking! It supports plenty of weight too.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased this along with the matching media stand. I was happy with the mattress and bed frame I purchased from them, so figured it was worth the risk - at the time there were no reviews. Pros: Looks Good Easy to put together Supports up to 100lbs. (check manufacturers documentation, this was accurate when I purchased it) Bars beneath shelves should prevent excessive warping. (See pictures) Cons: None so far! Overall I think this was a great purchase. It will be easy to deal with when I move, it should last for a long time, and it wasn't a hassle to assemble. What more could you ask for in a coffee table?
customer_reviews.author: Joey D.

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: This item came with a crack and wood peeling off. It was super easy to assemble and took approximately five minutes or less. It collects a lot of dust. Fingermarks are very visible. Overall, I would not recommend this item if you care about quality. UPDATE: The edges of this table are extremely sharp like knives. I have hurt my knee multiple times on accident. Anything you put on the table will leave marks, even just a cup of water. Also, it collects a ton of dust. Overall, I would be ok with this table if it wasn't for the EXTREMYL SHARP edges. You should not have to get injured by a coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Great for a pet cage stand and storage
customer_reviews.text: I took the idea of another reviewer and bought 2 of these for small animal pet habitat stands. These are perfect for this purpose. They are sturdy metal and have 3 metal supports under each the top and bottom shelf. I was able to put these together in no time, 5-10 minutes per table. They are the perfect size, sturdy and have plenty of room for the animal storage items. I love these for this purpose. Cage is the living world deluxe habitat extra-large. This isn't something I personally would use as living room furniture now as an adult earning a substantial living but would be great for someone living on a tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable imperfectio on the table top
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with a very noticeable imperfection on the top of it. We didn't notice until we (my husband) got to that piece. Once put together he didn't want to have to take it apart and try to get it back into the box that was ripped open in order to return it. The table looks really red in person and cheap. It was for staging a condo we were selling and we would have had to cancel the photographer and delay selling until a new table came. We should have ordered a different table and returned it when the new table came. Now it's too late and we are stuck with a table that arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Facas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We were ready to upgrade from a clunky old coffee table to something more modern and sleek. With IKEA a few hours away, we turned to Amazon to find something that could be delivered to us! This coffee table was a piece of cake to put together (maybe 15 minutes) and looks great in the living room. The only downside is that it can smudge easily, but wiping it down makes it look like new again. The price was absolutely right for this piece, too!
customer_reviews.author: LadyRed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is exactly the modern style that I wanted and since it is made of metal, it is very sturdy! It's of a decent weight so it doesn't slide on the carpet if I prop my feet up on it, but light enough so that I can move it without straining myself. The only reason it doesn't get 5-stars is because some of the metal parts were stained when they arrived. I just covered it with some decorative tape and it looks just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, Love the size. But I cant use it! Theres no instructions that came with it, nor did the tools and nails come with it! I bought it as a gift for a newly wed couple, thought it was perfect for their little apartment but I guess not. How embarrassing! Such a hassle to go out and beyond to buy some tools and nails when everything was suppose to be delivered and ready to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: afang1004

customer_reviews.title: Instructions and Part ID. None of the items are identified. No A, B, C or D.
customer_reviews.text: Looked at all the pieces. There are no sticker or identification markers on any of the parts. The only marker is on the 8 Screws. That can not be identified. Which one is the top or bottom. Who knows. I do not like it. I do not want it. I will just through it away. Do not even want to tell Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Folen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I was not expecting much. But, one of the rungs had already broken away from the side before we even set it up. Not sturdy whatsoever. I had bought a cart from a different company (Mr. Ironstone). I wish they had a coffee table as that piece went together very easily and is very sturdy, unlike this one.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Great for an inexpensive table. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This table is a great value for money. Table was really easy to assemble. Hardly took 10 minutes to assemble. All the parts were in good condition. It feels great quality given the price. The only thing I wish it had was rubber feet. This table skids a lot on wooden floors. Better rubber feet would have prevented that.
customer_reviews.author: Vignesh Gawali

customer_reviews.title: not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I received two 'bottom' panels instead of a top and a bottom. Because of the hassle of having to box it up and send it back (It's heavy), I decided not to return it, and just made it work with my own construction knowledge. However, not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Thompson

customer_reviews.title: perfect for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: i put together myself. everything was level and fit together perfectly. the face wooden surfaces are very thin. does not look real or very heavy duty. but the price is right. not forever furniture. stylish when matches with the other side tables. perfect for apartment living. i do not place cups or anything wet on the surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: It sounds more like hard plastic when you put things on it, but to me that means no paint chips or water stain bubbles as easily. This was super easy to put together too so anyone can do it. There was a small scratch on one edge, but because the whole thing is black and I prefer low light in my living room, I can’t notice it unless I am right there. For $50, I am very happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and looks great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put this together within an hour. The only issue I have with it is that the top table piece is slightly warped so the corner edge doesn't lay completely flat, it pops up a bit. I tried to put something heavy on it to flat it out but it hasn't worked. It's not a big deal to me though, especially for it only being $50. Overall, it's a very sturdy table, easy to put together, and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: KMC

customer_reviews.title: VERY easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means a handy woman, and neither do I like putting things together so I was very careful when selecting which table to buy. I have to say this table was definitely worth my money, in terms of how easy it was to assemble. I put it together with a friend in less than 30 mins. The instructions were very easy to follow. Highly recommend for anyone who doesn't like putting crap together, but still needs an affordable table lol
customer_reviews.author: Modupe A.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: This table looks exactly like the picture. Ours came with a little chipped wood so we turned it over so the nice part was facing up. It gets dirty easily so you definitely want to buy some coasters and clean it frequently. I’m a clean freak so i can’t stand seeing the little spots after water gets on it. Very sturdy. Overall, it’s nice but i probably would buy something different if i had to choose next time.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Love it, as described, arrived ahead of time, packaging was great, very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The table is neat, sturdy and simple in design yet beautiful. It was easy to assemble and it was ready in 20 minutes top. I got it ahead of due time of arrival and the packaging was very good. All in all, I'm happy we got this table with this affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Akram Alhinnawi

customer_reviews.title: Little smaller than you realize
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece, but it does come across as a little 'cheap'. The metal pieces are really thin so it looks a little awkward. The wood is a nice color! FYI, I know the dimensions are listed, but this is a little shorter than you think. We may be replacing with something a little high.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky M

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist, sturdy and sleek design.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together that you just see how it is designed in the supplied drawing, check that all parts are accounted for - then just start assembling. Upon completion, a sturdy and well-thought out design.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Philipp

customer_reviews.title: The wooden color and finish are not the most beautiful. I'm not saying it is awful
customer_reviews.text: The wooden color and finish are not the most beautiful. I'm not saying it is awful, but it could be improved. I decided to use marble paper instead and it gives it a twist. The base is well made. You can't see the welding. The wood piece is cut to perfection to fit. Overall a good piece for the price. Any other similar table I found at the time of my moving cost double.
customer_reviews.author: Anis

customer_reviews.title: great Buy! Great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Coffee table is great easy to assemble. Very modern looking. If you buy a TV stand and coffee table on Amazon I would triple check the measurements. Our TV stand was two times smaller than the coffee table was everything looked funny
customer_reviews.author: Don pattershall

customer_reviews.title: Slight Issue
customer_reviews.text: Using the table as a TV stand. I have a 55" Vizio TV placed on it. Just fits. Was a little disappointed in the top shelf - appeared to be warped slightly, so was not sitting inside frame level. After turning the piece over, fit better, but still not flush. With the weight of the TV, not noticeable. Wouldnt be happy if using it as a coffee table! Can't beat the price and it looks like photo. No problem with stability.
customer_reviews.author: Beav

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking everywhere for decently priced coffee and end tables for my apartment that don't look the price. I'm so glad I discovered the Zinus tables! This coffee table was pretty easy to assemble with the included Allen wrench, and it looks great in my living room. I ordered the black, and I love the look of it. Especially in a small apartment, this design is perfect and light, where a "heavy" (design wise) piece of furniture would eat up the space. It seems sturdy so far and matches the Zinus end tables perfectly. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: whatsername

customer_reviews.title: 1 year review
customer_reviews.text: Clean modern look, very simple to set up. Me and my wife use this table often, so it has had its share of spills, wet spots, you name it. It has held up surprisingly well. There have't been any chips off the metal frame, and no scratches or swelling of the pressed wood top. For the price point, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Justin I. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: amazingly simple functional coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Very simple design, easy to assemble. Can't beat the price. The metal frame is quite solid. The wood panels are presswood, but for the price, who cares? Bought the night stands also, same comments, great deal for short term furniture.
customer_reviews.author: John Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Basic quality that functions well.
customer_reviews.text: Hi Everyone, This product does have a basic quality, so the price is a bit expensive. Under the right lighting, the product may look good, but that is rarely the case. It does actually function well as a table, and I have no excuses for that. The only downside is the price and look, otherwise, you have a fully functioning table with basic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danyal Banihashemi

customer_reviews.title: SUPER easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bottom Line Up Front: SUPER easy to put together. Literally 8 screws and an allen wrench. Very sturdy for how light it is. Looks like a high-quality table and really accentuates the living room. Perfect height I love everything about this table, and after just recently purchasing a ceiling mount for a projector that required nearly the intelligence of Einstein to put together, this was extremely refreshing. It took me two minutes to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this coffee table for my studio apartment. Perfect size and I like that has that bottom shelf for easy access to things you may not want at all times on the table top.
customer_reviews.author: Tanvir Talukder

customer_reviews.title: worthless
customer_reviews.text: it's made of paper. and arrived broken. terrible quality. and terrible qa. I wouldn't recommend it because it is made of paper and if you spill something on its edge it would expand and destroy the top. the legs were missing rubber stoppers on 2 of them, and all bent. one corner of the paper top is already expanded and uneven.
customer_reviews.author: stiff

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Good table overall. Very sharpccorners and the boards are cut just too much leaving a little gap. Not very noticeable. Would definitely reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good product, looks nice and will last if you take care of it.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Looks professional. However does get loose time to time and have to tighten the screws after awhile. (If you move your furniture frequently.) Don't let ppl lean on it and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: it's a bit clunky and larger than i imagined but for the price compared to other coffee tables is very good!
customer_reviews.text: True to color, not difficult to assemble. The dementions are kind of weird, it's a bit clunky and larger than i imagined but for the price compared to other coffee tables is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and simple to put together, also sturdy. It’s shelf is really convenient for storage- we have two small storage baskets on it (the larger 12x12 square baskets won’t quite fit). Really happy for the price and it’s a really decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap (well duh, it is) dont think it will last more than a year or two around kids but im still happy with it. Put marble contact paper on the top to make a cute trendy table for under 40$
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together and extremely light
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and extremely light. Looks great in my living room. Mostly for decoration, it's not super heavy duty sturdy. The wooden top just lifts off, so don't sit on it or put too many things on it, as I suspect it is probably more fragile than it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Made cheap/looks cheap.
customer_reviews.text: A piece came broken so it wasn’t very sturdy. Easy to assemble but looks relatively cheap. I wouldn’t recommend unless there were no other options.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and a good price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's actually very nice. I was originally going to get a table from Ikea, but this was half the cost and similar in look. I'd either seal the top or make sure to use coasters. I have a feeling it would bubble if gotten wet.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Allen

customer_reviews.title: No color consistency
customer_reviews.text: This brand has zero color consistency. I ordered the same color as the other items from this store (TV stand, end tables), and they all came as a red instead of espresso. This one came and is black!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table.
customer_reviews.text: We are using to support a large flat screen TV. Works great, sturdy and very easy to assemble. A winner !
customer_reviews.author: Frank B. Sprow

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful !!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is perfect for a low-income home. It's easy to put together, sturdy and beautiful. It's also the perfect size for my small one bedroom apartment. Very pleased with the product and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angila

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY FOR A LOW PRICE// EASY ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to put together but you might need a hand just to hold the wood slates from not falling when flipping over, and I can see this coffee table being easy to transport for a move and disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Faith B.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed given cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this coffee table given it’s afforadable price. It looks sleek and is functional. I wanted something with the extra storage underneath and I am glad to see this is a sturdy table despite its small frame. Super easy to assemble. I’m happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ebeezy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for good quality table!
customer_reviews.text: Great table, awesome quality and look for the price. Just be careful when building don’t let pieces run together because it will mark, but it fits great with my space, and is the best price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update: Minor cosmetic damage during transit, otherwise awesome
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I had to contact Amazon customer service, but they were able to partially refund me for the cosmetic damage that occurred during shipping. I chose that and to keep the table as I was able to flip the damaged piece over - it looks good as new now that it's assembled. I am otherwise very happy with this table - I like the look and it was incredibly easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Casey F.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many items from Zinus over the past year. This is the one piece I am extremely disappointed with. The package was damaged upon arrival. The cheap covered plywood does not have finished edges, which wouldn’t be a problem, except for the fact that it keeps trying to lift and show.
customer_reviews.author: Nishell Kolb

customer_reviews.title: but super easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: Nor fancy, nor from design house, but super easy to assembly, solid and just do what it intend to do : be coffee table. Allso i have dogs and one is chewing on anything, this table is no go for the dog since wooden part is protected by metal "cage" so no wooden part is open
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, modern look! Quality I have come to expect from Zinus!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in minutes! Did come with a manufacturing defect (hole in leg was drilled through wrong side) but was easily fixed on my own and with no visible damage. Sleek design, sturdy and looks great! The wood panels clean easy and retain their color, look, and shine! I also have a bed frame and mattress from Zinus and I couldn't be happier with every one of their products I own!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Cannon III

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, quality is ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale, so I would say I paid a fair price for the quality it is. Comparable to any assembly-needed, particle-board furniture. The bars seem sturdy, but I wouldn’t put much weight on it. Looks great (like actual powder coating), and I won’t be upset if it gets normal wear & tear from kids. Painted the top to match IKEA black-brown. Cannot comment on longevity as I just got it
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute table. Reddish colored wood.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and look of this table. However, the wood is very reddish on mine. I wasn’t expecting that. Could be my fault for not looking closely at the pictures. It still looks awesome in my living room. Love the table overall.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Landers

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived late thanks to USPS failure to deliver on time. But that doesn't take away from the products value. We're happy with the construction and quality. This is a nicely done table that was easily put together in a matter of minutes with the allen tool provided.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Good value & easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This table is sleek and modern looking. Not family-heirloom furniture quality--but good value for the $$. Best of all, EASY to put together, and I am HOPELESS at assembly! It even comes with the little wrench you need to put in the screws.
customer_reviews.author: happy kitty mom

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice
customer_reviews.text: Definitely received a returned product. It came all scratched up; dents in some places, and the package for the screws had been opened already and everything fell out. Easy to put together thought
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Good for price. Annoying assembly
customer_reviews.text: Kinda of awful to assemble. The metal straped up quite a bit during assembly. Looks nice. I dont trust it to hold very much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Most beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Mid Century Modern and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for my Mid Century Modern living room. Sturdy nicer than the picture. I've seen similar style tables for much more, the price is great and so is the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product I knew it said used but it also said like new and that was completely false. The wood was chipped in multiple parts, the metal was broken. I couldn’t even put the table together. I am not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lynzie Gehring

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coffee table, especially for $40! Elevated the style of our very small apartment and is easy to move when we have guests. I also love that there is the shelf under the top of the table, really increases storage space when you have none to begin with. Obviously this is not real wood or an heirloom but it serves its purpose just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Chertok

customer_reviews.title: Bought "Like-New" in Orig Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived, wood laminate was chipped on two corners. Was not in original packaging, the Styrofoam was in a million pieces of all variety of sizes. Metal heavily scuffed and scratched from poor previous assembly. Foot pads clearly have seen better days (only 2 shown). Can't say anything about the look / structural integrity because no hardware arrived to assemble it. Not even sure if I can return it due to the impossible re-packaging job I would need to do. Bought other items from this company which are doing great. Unfortunately, that's all I can say for the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Austin N Urban

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and sturdy. I can't believe how cheap this is, it seems like it's worth $100.
customer_reviews.author: John Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Clean simple lines - look great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as TV stands for 50" flat screens in the bedrooms and fit perfect! With matching nightstands and platform bed I updated two bedrooms for under $600!
customer_reviews.author: Rhob Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and modern looking coffee table. Good quality for the price and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up but
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up but... my wooden board for the top was bigger than it should be it was like 1/8 inch bigger i live in nyc and it is very hard for me to carry this to all the way to ups store to return it i would keep it but not happy
customer_reviews.author: Suzushi Ryu

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable table ! Easy to put together !
customer_reviews.text: Great table ! Didn’t expect it to look as good as it does. Pretty sturdy material. Real easy to put together. But be careful placing product on each other and if the wood falls it can easily break. Just beware it is fragile. But I love this table ! Very strong once you got it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Pricilia

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and not too hard to assemble but a piece of wood chipped off when I took it out the package.
customer_reviews.author: girl3000

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and it took about 10 minutes to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: loved it the item looks just like the picture although ...
customer_reviews.text: loved it the item looks just like the picture although for some reason i thought the wood would a little light, it arrive on time and was super simple to put together. no damaged parts or damaged box. Beware it might be alittle bigger than you think but it is still amazing
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: The coffee table looked nice, but was poor quality and didn't seem very ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The coffee table looked nice, but was poor quality and didn't seem very durable. Ours came with small chips in the wood, and the box arrived with a tear in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, simple, and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and easy to assemble. Just a little tip; if you have cats, then be prepared to have to tighten some screws as they will loosen from your cat jumping on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Syerra

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but happy
customer_reviews.text: The wood came a bit damaged (chipped corner), but fortunately I was able to flip it so it's not visible. The table looks great, but the quality control at the company may not be the finest.
customer_reviews.author: Matteo

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together (like 20-30 min) and just as pictured. Looks great in our living room, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great basic table!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to elevate the litter box off the floor and this works perfectly. Easy to put together. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble - Sophisticated Look
customer_reviews.text: It looks black in the picture but it's actually a dark brown. It's super easy to put together, I didn't need to ask a friend or anyone not for help woo! I'm so glad I got this, it really makes my living room look grown up and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Color is more red than brown. Title and photos misleading. They should call it "reddish brown".
customer_reviews.author: OFS

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months, arrived with a metal corner ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 3 months, arrived with a metal corner twisted. Made it work ,then another corner came apart Sheesh
customer_reviews.author: tacomarealtor

customer_reviews.title: Table wasn’t as sturdy as I would have hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: Table wasn’t as sturdy as I would have hoped it would be. It looked and felt cheap when assembled.
customer_reviews.author: D. Theisen

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly as picture.  EXPRESSO DARK
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. Very simple to put together. It only took my 9 year old and I 5 minutes. Love it. But beware of the metal corners. I'm a klutz and banged my knee right into it. It does hurt lol. But nothing end table corner pads cant fix if you have a small toddler of a grown toddler like me who is accident prone. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Addison

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This table is simple, light, easy to put together, easy to move, and a bit elegant--much like my soul.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Meyerhofer

customer_reviews.title: I was not at all happy either the material
customer_reviews.text: I was not at all happy either the material. The wood was very unsturdy and chipped in the corners. I wouldn’t place more than a bible on it and I certainly won’t be using it for a foot stool.
customer_reviews.author: LowRiderS2017

customer_reviews.title: A+++ Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: Like the simple design of this table. Useful and minimal. Price was right, also.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. The leg is scratched and missing a plastic end capper and the top piece was smashed on a corner
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Balue
customer_reviews.text: I have now made several purchases from Zinus, they have won my confidence! I love their simple lines and easy asssembly!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Tieman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this table is perfect. Easy to assemble, and looks cute in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived with wrong parts.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived with wrong parts. When I called Zinus, they held me on the line for a long time. Eventually I gave up and left a voicemail, but no call back. I returned the item to Amazon. I recommend buying this kind of stuff in person next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mahmood

customer_reviews.title: It’s not that bad if the film wouldn’t have come off the “wood”
customer_reviews.text: HAd damage to the cheap wood but you get what you pay for. It’s not that bad if the film wouldn’t have come off the “wood”
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Really great coffee table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really great coffee table for the price! I got the red wood/ chest nut color even though it didn't really match my living room but I really like the color and the simple design!
customer_reviews.author: Jules flores

customer_reviews.title: Zinus makes good products
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the end tables then bought this as well. I also bought a Zinus bedframe. Love the style and color well worth the purchase price
customer_reviews.author: Humboo

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The table came well-packaged, was very easy to assemble, and looks gorgeous. For this price point, an awesome buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: SUPER EASY & AFFORDABLE
customer_reviews.text: LOVED HOW EASY IT WAS TO ASSEMBLY! Did it ALL by myself! Also, LOVED how all the tools came with the product. Will definitely be shopping with you AGAIN! :)
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Half the parts were missing or damaged.
customer_reviews.text: This product came with: 2 flat tabletops. One was scratched. 2 brace/leg sets. One was missing. The other was bashed in at the end. 8 screws. Two were missing. Needless to say I had difficulty building a functioning table with these parts.
customer_reviews.author: LEPT0N

customer_reviews.title: CHIPPED ALREADY??
customer_reviews.text: Wow. And the company is hard to get ahold of for returns. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: MirandaD08

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, not recommended for every day use. Nice accent table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table for Price
customer_reviews.text: Very good table for price, the two wooden plates are supported by 5 thin (probably) steel rods. Makes me wonder about putting somethng too heavy, but for daily use anything should be okay. (Wouldnt recommend anyone sitting on it..) Otherwise just minor scratches on the side, most likely from the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Stinky

customer_reviews.title: Had to order twice. Broken both times.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the table once, and one of its feet were smashed in. I ordered it again and it had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Perry G

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little table
customer_reviews.text: VERY easy to put together, probably took me 5 minutes. Pretty sturdy considering there is literally 4 parts to it. Table looks beautiful and is worth the price by a long shot!
customer_reviews.author: Jake McGreevy

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough to withstand kitties jumping all over it and being used as a foot rest as well. Color was nice too.
customer_reviews.author: LindseyD

customer_reviews.title: It’s.... okay 💁🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: Table is kinda , LEGO-ish .. shakey and slightly fragile but looks great. Do not put much pressure on it . And also do not like how corners stick out
customer_reviews.author: Diamond B.

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table looks great in our living room! Wasn’t too bad to put together, but I recommend getting a second pair of hands to hold things steady. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT.it is sleek and looks stunning.the length is perfect,i have a small livingroom DOZE NOT LOOK LIKE A BIG ELEPHANT IN THE ROOM! It's airy and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

product_meta.title: Zinus Troy Modern Studio Collection Deluxe Rectangular Coffee Table, Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:Espresso| Style:DeluxeThe Zinus Modern Studio Collection is an ideal combination of function and style. The Deluxe Rectangular Coffee Table is functional in your main living space as a coffee table, or to hold various items in any room of the home. With an additional lower shelf, storage space is maximized. The sturdy, black square steel tubing and high density panel with rich black wood grain finish will add an elegant touch to any décor. Easy to assemble. Worry free limited 1 year warranty.
feature_bullets: Functional and stylish with additional lower shelf
Dimensions: 42 Inches L x 21 Inches W x 18 Inches H with 100 pounds weight capacity
Sturdy, strong square steel tubing frame
Rich black wood grain finish is easy to clean
NOTE: Refer user manual before use
